input.sentences: we went on vacation . the place we stayed had a jacuzzi .
the kids really enjoyed the swimming pool .
i made sure to put lots of sunscreen on them .
they had fun jumping in the water with their dad .
output.sentences: Our hotel suite came with our own personal jacuzzi
The pool opened early,and we had a blast
We all need a lot of sunscreen for this weather
Bobby is being carried in by Dad,just til he gets more comfortable in the water,but my other brothers are ready to dive in.
Best part is getting toweled off by Dad.
